description:
Top building supplier in Los Angeles is seeking a dedicated individual to ensure the timely and accurate shipment of orders. Our ideal candidate has a friendly, customer-first attitude, is highly organized, and handles pressure like a pro!

Responsibilities:

  • Utilize software to track, check, prioritize, and route orders efficiently.
  • Manage essential documents such as advanced shipping notices, packing slips, and bills of lading.
  • Prepare shipments and negotiate rates for commercial conveyance, selecting the most cost-effective and efficient shipping methods and containers.
  • Collaborate with warehouse, purchasing, and other managers to streamline processes and improve efficiency.
  • Resolve any issues or discrepancies related to shipped orders promptly.
  • Ensure strict compliance with legal regulations and company policies.
  • Provide regular reports to management on operational activities and challenges.

Desired Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a shipping coordinator or similar role.
  • Solid knowledge of logistics procedures and shipping documentation.
  • Proficiency in preparing routine administrative paperwork.
  • Computer savvy with excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel); experience with Sage 50 is a plus.
  • Experience in international, state-to-state, and local logistics.
  • Excellent organizational and communication skills. Bilingual a plus.
  • Strong problem-solving abilities.
  • High school diploma required; BS/BA in supply chain, logistics, or a related field preferred.
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team.
  • Must have great customer service.
  • Management of orders being packed.
  • Able to work overtime when needed.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $22.00 - $26.75 per hour

Benefits: 401(k)

Schedule: 8-hour shifts, Monday to Friday with overtime opportunities.

Experience Preferred:

  • Logistics shipping: 5 years
  • Sage: 5 years

Work Location: Commerce. This is an in-house position.

If you are a dedicated and detail-oriented individual looking to join a top building supplier, we encourage you to apply. We look forward to potentially working with you!

Company Description

We are leading construction and building materials manufacturer.
